title: can pytorch dataparallel scatter less batch size for the master gpu card?
body_html:
For some task like segmentation, the label and loss computation will need some larger memory than general task, which leads to large memory consumption for mater gpu card.
How can I set the master card (gpu:0) less batch size than other slave gpu cards?
For example, batchsize(5) and gpus(2) will lead to scatter results (3, 2) for 0,1 cards;
batchsize(5) and gpus(3) will lead to scatter results (2,2,1) for 0,1,2 cards.
Is it possible to get the results (2,3) and (1,2,2) for the scatter results?
And how?
